column1: length ball around off, a bit of shape away, pushed to covers
length outside off once more, pushes it towards third man to get off the mark
fuller around off, once again a hint of swing in to the batsman. Pushed back towards the bowler
length ball on the leg stump and finishing around middle and off, tucked away towards midwicket
fuller around off and once again a hint of swing away from the batsman, drives on the front foot but cannot beat the cover fielder
length ball but straying on the pads this time, tucked away towards deep square leg for four
length ball around off, slaps it to the right of the bowler, beats the mid-off as well. Four more to Bangladesh
short of length outside off, goes for the pull, not in full control but manages to get it behind square leg, another four
make that three in a row for Naim. Another length ball on the stumps, Naim backs away and pulls to the left of diving Chahal at mid-on
length ball outside off, looks to push towards covers, misses as the ball keeps a touch low
length ball around middle and leg, cramping Naim for room who gets an inside edge onto the pads. They sneak in a single as the ball rolls down behind the stumps
length outside off, steers it behind point by arching his back, only a single though
length ball around off, a punch off the back foot through covers. Washington Sundar puts in the chase and the slide to stop it just inside. The outfield looks unaffected by the rain last evening
length outside off, goes for the cut without much feet movement, gets beaten
length ball around off, pushes it towards the bowler from the back foot
length outside off, Naim once again looks to drive without moving his feet, beaten again
length ball around off, punched towards cover from the crease
fuller on the stumps, punched right back. Chahar gets a hand to it but fails to latch on to. Should have been a dot ball but ends up conceding a single
fuller on the pads, driven towards deep midwicket for a single
length outside off, drifting away from the batsman, Liton pushes at it and works it towards short third man
length outside off, goes back and cuts hard but cannot beat Krunal at cover
overcompensating this time. A full-toss on the stumps, Liton moves across and pulls it to the left of short fine leg
shuffles in his crease to distract the batsman. But Washington bowls a length ball around off, mistimes a slog sweep towards deep square leg
length on the pads, tucked away towards square leg for a quick single
but no change of fortunes for Khaleel. A short of length ball around off, Naim just transfers his weight back and smashes it through midwicket. Was in the air but in the gap as well
length ball wide outside off, Naim was moving towards the leg side and cannot reach there in the end. Perhaps that's the line to bowl to him
length ball around fifth stump, looks to dab it on the off side, but it hits the toe end of the bat and dribbles past Pant on his left. Third man cannot get across in time
a wide yorker outside off, Naim cannot get his bat on it, surprises Pant who had to take it near his head height
length outside off, stays back and steers it towards third man

fuller outside off, Liton was moving across to scoop it but misses and gets hit on the shoe on the full. Looks like there was some bat involved and they sneak in a run as the ball rolls towards covers
nice little chip over extra cover to a length ball around off, there is a fielder in the deep. Liton was good for the first one and a half run but hobbled thereafter
length ball on the stumps, pulls it straight towards short midwicket

tossed up around off, Liton skips down the track and looks to go aerial. Fails to make any contact and Pant whips off the bails. Liton is way short but they are checking if Pant collected it in front of the stumps. Yes, a little part of the gloves was in front of the stumps when the ball made the first contact with the gloves. It's a no-ball, and the free-hit is coming up
too full on the leg stump, Liton clears his front leg and lofts it over mid-on to add insult to injury
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it past the diving Krunal at point, should have been stopped but he lets it go through his hands
length ball on the pads, flicks it towards square leg
tossed up on the stumps, Naim stays back and tucks it in front of square leg
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg

fuller around off, Liton goes for a slog sweep but gets a top edge. Three men converging - Dube, Pant and Rohit and it's Rohit who goes for it, gets his hands but cannot latch on to it as he tumbles away
short of length around off, pulls it towards deep square leg
fuller around off, slaps it towards extra cover
slower in the air, length ball around middle and spinning away, the ball stops at the batsman as well who ends up chipping it towards short midwicket
length ball way outside off, Naim reaches for it and taps it towards cover-point

a googly from Chahal, bamboozles Liton who was looking to work it on the leg side, the ball hits the top of the bat and ricochets in front of the batsman off Pant's chest. Liton sets off for a run, not aware where the ball is. Pant is and puts in the slide and hits the stumps direct at the striker's end. No need of replays this time. Liton finally runs out of luck
fuller around off, drives it towards long-off to get off the mark
fuller outside off, Naim goes for the reverse sweep but misses
short of length outside off, cuts it towards point. Dhawan throws it towards the keeper, not the best of the throws and Pant fumbles to concede an extra run
length ball on middle and leg, goes back and pulls it towards deep-backward square leg
length ball around middle and leg, looks to work towards midwicket, gets a leading edge towards extra cover
length ball on the pads, misses the flick and struck on the pads. Was heading down
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on from the back foot
fuller around off, gives himself some room and chips it over extra cover, comes back for the second. But Soumya Sarkar ran one short, so it's just a single
short of length around off, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
length ball outside off, creamed through covers, Chahar makes a tumbling stop to his left at deep cover
short of length around off, goes back and crunches the pull in front of square leg, one-bounce four
length ball around middle and leg, keeps it touch low, pulls it towards deep-backward square leg
length ball outside off, room there and Naim slaps it towards deep cover

length ball around off, backs away and smashes it hard but straight towards Rohit at extra cover. Soumya was looking for a run but Rohit fumbles before collecting the ball and that gives him the chance to retrace his steps. A direct-hit but he's in
length outside off, steered towards deep point
cheeky! Length ball on middle, going down Soumya's leg side but he changes his grip and reverse-paddles a shot to the point fence!
length ball, on middle, and worked off his pads to cow corner
holes out! Length ball, angling in, and he looks to slog this over deep midwicket, but no real timing there, and the fielder comfortably gets under it near the boundary. Nifty knock comes to an end
length ball, on off. Flicked away to square leg
length ball on off, and turning further away. He flays a cut to deep point
length ball, outside off. Makes room and guides a cut to point. Sundar finishes with 1-25
full, drifting into his pads, and nudged off his legs to the gap near midwicket. Keeper gives it a chase, so does the fielder running in from the deep
in the air but clears Rohit at long off! Full, outside off, and he came down the wicket to meet the ball. Not a convincing shot, but still enough to collect six
length ball, outside off, and Soumya walks across to meet the ball. But it's so wide that he opts to leave it
low full toss, outside off. Dug away to deep point

where's the ball? That's what Pant is wondering. This was a length ball on middle, and Mushifiqur tried to paddle it fine, but Pant walks across and the ball hits his shoulder, thereby stopping four runs.
angling down the leg side
full, on off, and tapped leg-side for a quick run
length ball, outside off, and Soumya tries to cut but misses out completely. Not a wide this time

Chahal lets Mushfiqur know who is the boss! Full, on off, and he's down on one knee to sweep. Off the bat's toe end, and deep midwicket takes a comfortable catch. Chahal gives Mushfiqur a massive fist-pump on his way back to the dugout
full, on off, and he drives with the turn to midwicket. They settle for one, but the direct hit from Iyer hits the stumps, thereby allowing the batsmen to steal a second run. Rohit isn't happy
A beauty! Full, on leg stump, and the batsman comes down the ground to drive. Ball turns away, takes his outside edge, and goes past Pant to third man. Bowler unlucky
length ball, on middle, and guided off the back foot to midwicket for a single
length ball, on off, and turning in. Guided with the bat's open face to point

Has Pant messed up again? Yes he has! No, he hasn't! Googly on off and turning away as the batsman skips down the ground. He misses the slog, and Pant collects the ball. Drags his gloves back and removes the bails, but the TV umpire wants to check whether Pant's gloves were behind the stumps. The big screen says 'not out', much to the delight of the Bangladesh's fans, but then the umpire tells Soumya that it's an error from the TV umpire. The big screen lights up again, and this time Soumya is given 'out'. Mighty close once again from Pant, the gloves were barely behind the stumps
full, on off, and driven down the ground to long on
length ball, on off, and worked away to the on-side
length ball, outside leg stump, and he makes room before guiding it fine to third man
length ball on off, and guided leg-side for a single
back of a length on off, and he ducks under this delivery
length ball, on off, and he runs it down to third man for a single
length ball on middle, and angling into him. Rocks back and fends to mid-on
full toss on off because the batsman came down the ground. Flat-batted to long on for a single
full, on leg stump, and worked off his pads to square leg for a single
low full toss, outside off, and left alone
quicker ball, length ball outside off, and he guides it down to point
overpitched outside off, goes for the reverse sweep but misses
full on middle, and drilled to wide long on. They call early for the second run
length ball on middle, and worked off his pads to deep midwicket
length ball, outside off, and flat-batted to wide long on. Throw from the deep hits Pant's pads before running away for an extra run
nearly a yorker on off, and dug away to wide long on. The captain lobs the ball into the keeper's gloves from far away, ensuring the ball doesn't bounce awkwardly on this occasion
full, on middle, and he comes down the wicket before drilling a drive past the fielder at cover. No chance of stopping that
slower ball, bouncer outside off. Tries to pull, but edged to the off side instead. They scamper across for a single

back of a length on middle, and he waits for the ball to get to him before rolling his wrists over a pull shot. Placed perfectly behind square, and the infielder sees the ball roll into the boundary line
full, on off, and driven to cover for a quick single
slower ball, full on off, and the batsman is through his attempted loft too early. Sliced in the air, and Rohit - at cover - settles under it to take a swirling catch
back of a length, angling across, and cut late between short third man and point. Useful boundary
length ball, outside off, and Mahmudullah walks across before opening the bat's face. Plays it late, and once again pierces the gap to the right of short third man
overpitched, a wide yorker that Mahmudullah can't put away
full and wide outside off, but the googly turns inwards. Tries to drive but inside-edged to short fine leg
full on middle, and tapped to mid-on for a quick single
full outside off, and turning further away. Mosaddek tries to defend but the ball goes past him
full outside off, and turning away once again. Can't make any connection
full outside off, and he tries to drive off the googly. Another inside-edge to the leg side
length ball, outside off, and cut square to deep point
full, on off, and hammered to wide long on
length ball, outside off, and guided to deep point

easy, peasy! Back of a length, outside off, and he tries to ramp it over third man. Unfortunately for him, the pace is too little, and therefore the fielder dives forward to take a simple catch. Chahar displays a unique celebration too
full, on off. Backs away and drives to deep cover
length ball, on off, and he comes down the wicket to slap a shot to cover
back of a length, on middle, and he tries to pull but misses. Through to the keeper
full and wide outside off. Shapes to lift a shot over cover but misses
full, outside off, and he clears his front leg to hammer a shot to the leg side. Misses out though, because of the lack f pace
yorker, on off, and sliced away to Chahar at deep point

full marks for creativity! Full, outside off, and he walks across the wickets before trying to paddle a shot over the keeper. Does that successfully, and the fielder in the deep can't cut it off either
full toss outside off, and the batsman was on his knees trying to paddle it fine again. He misses, and Pant fluffs the grab too. They scamper across
slower ball, full on middle, and guided to extra cover. They complete the second because of Krunal's wayward throw. Bangladesh make 153 for 6
and he begins with a big wide down the leg side. India are off the mark
fuller and a touch straighter, but still not straight enough, another wide
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg but apparently off the pads
length ball on the stumps, stays in his crease and defends
fuller around off, driven but cannot beat the man at mid-off
fuller around off, skips down the track and drives it through extra cover. Gets in the gap this time
fuller on the stumps, flicked away towards mid-on where Mahmudullah makes a fumble, the outfield is so quick there is no second chance
length ball around middle, Dhawan comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
length ball on the pads, and Rohit says thank you very much and pulls it behind square leg for four
length outside off, cuts it towards backward point where a partial stop allows the single
length ball on the pads, flicked away in front of square leg
a full toss on the stumps, flicked away towards deep square leg, only a single
another full toss, straight at the batsman. Dhawan skips down and pushes it towards mid-off
a yorker outside off, digs it out towards covers
gives himself some room but ends up mistiming this length ball towards cover
length outside off, flat-bats it towards mid-off, didn't middle it though
down the track but gets cramped as Al-Amin once again bowls one on a length at the batsman
length but way down the leg side this time
short of length on the stumps, pulls it down towards fine leg
length ball around off, tucked away towards deep square leg
length ball at middle and leg, Dhawan stays leg side of the ball and defends it down the ground
length ball around off and Rohit hits it uppishly to the left of mid-off and once it crossed Mahmudullah, it was always going to be a four
a slower one but too full and outside off, Rohit waits and opens the face of the bat, creams it through covers for back-to-back fours
length ball angling across, looks to run it down to third man but misses
a touch fuller around off, Rohit comes forward and just lofts it way over the bowler's head, into the sightscreen. Majestic
length ball around off, angling across the batsman, Rohit looks to push but gets beaten

uses his feet to this length ball and looks to work it on the leg side without being to the pitch of the ball, gets a leading edge over covers. Rohit wants to come back for the second but Dhawan sends him back wisely
length outside off, waits for it and steers it through point for four more
cheeky this time! Short of length outside off and Rohit just opens to face of the bat to dab it to the right of the short third man fielder
length ball around off, taps it behind point and gets to the other end
length ball at the leg stump, Dhawan was looking to move away to the leg side. Ends up defending it towards covers
fuller around off, drags it towards deep-backward square leg with a pull
length outside off, looks to hit it through covers but cannot middle it, gets a single though
a slower one, length ball down the leg side. Rohit goes for the pull but misses, the ball brushes his pads and dribbles towards the keeper
an attempted yorker but ends up as a low full-toss, Rohit squeezes it past the diving cover fielder to take India past 50
a yorker outside off, digs it out towards short third man
length ball at the stumps from around the wicket, tucked away in front of square leg
length ball, Rohit skips down the track and lofts it over long-off. The umpires are checking if it hit the boundary cushion on the full and yes, it did. He has moved to 43 off just 20 balls
Shafiul goes for a wide yorkers but once again ends up bowling a low full toss. Rohit gets down on one knee and taps it over midwicket, comes back for the third
length ball around off, works it towards midwicket for a single
tossed up around off, Dhawan steps out and smashes it over the bowler's head, fierce hit
slower through the air, length ball around middle and leg, Dhawan comes forward and defends gently
dropped short this time and Dhawan rocks back to pull, doesn't make a neat connection though. Luckily, it falls short of incoming Shafiul at deep midwicket
uses his feet this time and takes it on the full. Smashes it to the right of the deep midwicket fielder this time, finds the gap and the boundary
fuller around off, Dhawan chips it inside out over extra cover, gets a couple before the long-off fielder sends in the throw
gets to his fifty in style. Fuller on the stumps, and Rohit has slog swept into the orbit over deep midwicket for another six
length ball around off, works it towards long-on for one
length ball on the stumps, goes back and punches it towards midwicket
fuller on the stumps, uses his feet but gets too close to the ball, drives it towards long-on
fuller but down the leg side, Dhawan was almost over-balanced while trying to flick it. Misses but the umpire calls it a wide
length ball sliding down the leg side once more
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it through extra cover
too full outside off, latches on to it but can only dig it out towards long-off
fuller around off, drives it towards extra cover where Mahmudullah misfields and allows an extra run
fuller on the pads, uses his feet and flicks it towards deep midwicket
fuller around off, digs it out towards extra cover but cannot beat the fielder this time
skips down too early and Aminul shortens his length to beat him in the flight. Rohit adjusts and dabs it towards cover-point
length ball, works it towards midwicket for one
length ball around off and spinning in sharply to cramp Dhawan for room who defends it from the back foot
starts with a short one on the leg stump, Rohit's eyes light up and he just pulls it over deep midwicket. Not even going back, just a transfer of weight
short again, quicker and flatter and Rohit pulls it over deep square leg, 84 metres this one. 100 comes up for India
short of length outside off, stays back and pulls it over long-on, three sixes in a row. Can he do a Yuvraj?
fuller outside off, looks to smash it over long-off but can only get an inside edge that rolls towards short fine leg
length outside off, cuts it past point for a couple, Mahmudullah chases and puts in a desperate slide to keep it just inside
down the track but gets too far ahead and takes it on full, works it towards deep extra cover
full, outside off, and hammered past the bowler to long on. Rohit wanted the second run, he's not particularly happy
length ball, outside off, and cut behind square. Chase for Mithun in the deep
full, outside off, and he comes down the ground before mistiming a chipped shot to long on
length ball on off, and tapped down the ground to long on for a walking single
leg stump pegged back! Full on off, and turning into Dhawan as he skips down the ground. Misses the slog, and the ball sneaks under his bat
full on middle. Rocks back and works it off his pads to square leg. Keeps the strike
length ball, outside off. Cut square to deep point
full on middle. The attempted drive is mistimed to long on
full and wide outside off. Mistimes his attempted drive
length ball on middle. Swivels to pull along the ground
length ball on off, and he comes down the ground before using his bat like a sword to scythe a cut to deep point
full, on off stump. Flicked to deep midwicket. Rohit will keep strike
full, on off. The legbreak is defended

length ball, on middle, but the ball stays low. Rohit attempts to pull, but he drags the shot, and the skyer's been taken at deep midwicket. Rohit looks at the toe-end of the bat before walking back. An exquisite innings comes to a close
tossed up outside off, and through to the keeper
length ball on leg stump. Rahul goes deep into his crease and whips a shot to deep backward square
full, on off stump. Defended
deposited! Full, on off, and he clears his front leg before hammering a six over long on
good length, on off, and cut square to point
length ball, on leg stump. Stays on the back foot to defend
lovely! Back of a length on middle, but Iyer bends his knees, gets under the ball, and sticks his bat up to ramp a four over short third man
back of a length on middle. Blocked off the back foot
back of a length on middle, and worked away to deep midwicket
back of a length on middle. Rahul waits for the slower ball to reach him before guiding a late cut to third man
length ball on off, and punched to long on
wristy! Full on middle, but Iyer rolls his wrists over this ball to guide a boundary to the fine-leg fence
length ball just outside off, and defended
full on middle, and worked off his pads to backward square leg
back of a length outside off, and punched in front of square for four! Stands tall and clobbers it to extra cover
full, on middle, and flicked to deep midwicket
waist-high full toss on middle, and flicked to deep midwicket
full toss on middle, and driven to mid-off
low full toss on middle, and flicked to deep backward square. Scores tied
India win with 26 balls to spare! Length ball on middle. Iyer wants to pull, but leading edge goes to third man instead
